data.details:
Social Innovator (S)
Grades: 9, 10
Girl Scouts are always on the lookout for ways to help others and make a difference. But how do you go from identifying a social problem to developing a social solution? With the skills of a social innovator in your pocket, you will be prepared to change the world. Explore the big picture, make connections, build empathy, and develop a solution. 
*This event is for 2016 registered Girl Scouts, and registered & approved adult volunteers.
* For safety and supervision reasons, troops and individuals are not permitted to bring non-Girl Scouts or siblings. 
*Girl/adult ratios must be followed and adults are expected to stay on the premises during the event. 

$15/girl, $1/adult
Contact: Brittany McCallister 904.389.3071
